## Paginator.getPagesWithDispersion() method

Gets list of page numbers with specified dispersion

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getPagesWithDispersion(dispersion: number): number[];
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  dispersion | number | Number identifying dispersion |

<b>Returns:</b>

number Page numbers according specified dispersion
